data.name: Monster Loves You Too!
data.detailed_description:
Live the life of a Monster within a society of fantastic creatures. Hunt for food, make friends and allies, and battle your own instincts in order to rise above your humble origins in the sequel to the best-selling Monster Loves You!

Begin Life as a Tiny Morsel

You're a defenseless critter. Grow arms, legs, and teeth. If you survive to childhood, you'll find yourself in the back alleys of the sprawling Monster city of Asch, orphaned and left to scavenge for scraps while fending off larger Monsters.
‏‏‎ ‎

Survive using FLESH, BRAIN, and GUTS.

Use these three resources to overcome your Monstrous, impulsive tendencies. Spend them wisely, though, as they only replenish gradually, when you rest or feast. Here's a scenario: When the towering, 300-toothed Grattrag scours the ravine below for your friends, what will you do?
‎‏‏‎ ‎

Visit the Fantastic Land of Monsters!

Built beneath ancient Human ruins, Asch is your home city, where you'll scavenge and hide among the alleys to survive. The Sharps are where wild Adolescents live free from the shackles of Monstrous society. Join a gang, or form your own. Visit Trade Hill, where shady Monsters meet to exchange precious, deadly Human artifacts.
‏‏‎ ‎

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 Compatible GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
